br.ufpr.dinf.gres.architecture.representation.architectureControl

Class ArchitectureFindElementControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufpr.dinf.gres.architecture.representation.architectureControl.ArchitectureFindElementControl

  • public class ArchitectureFindElementControl
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the implementation of all the method from Architecture that is used to find an specific element from architecture
